description: Lists the Amazon Web Services Cost and Usage Report available to this account.

nested_items.name: ReportDefinitions
nested_items.description: An Amazon Web Services Cost and Usage Report list owned by the account.

nested_items.name: ReportName
nested_items.description: The name of the report that you want to create. The name must be unique, is case sensitive, and can't include spaces.

nested_items.name: TimeUnit
nested_items.description: The length of time covered by the report.

nested_items.name: Format
nested_items.description: The format that Amazon Web Services saves the report in.

nested_items.name: Compression
nested_items.description: The compression format that Amazon Web Services uses for the report.

nested_items.name: AdditionalSchemaElements
nested_items.description: A list of strings that indicate additional content that Amazon Web Services includes in the report, such as individual resource IDs.

nested_items.name: S3Bucket
nested_items.description: The S3 bucket where Amazon Web Services delivers the report.

nested_items.name: S3Prefix
nested_items.description: The prefix that Amazon Web Services adds to the report name when Amazon Web Services delivers the report. Your prefix can't include spaces.

nested_items.name: S3Region
nested_items.description: The region of the S3 bucket that Amazon Web Services delivers the report into.

nested_items.name: AdditionalArtifacts
nested_items.description: A list of manifests that you want Amazon Web Services to create for this report.

nested_items.name: RefreshClosedReports
nested_items.description: Whether you want Amazon Web Services to update your reports after they have been finalized if Amazon Web Services detects charges related to previous months. These charges can include refunds, credits, or support fees.

nested_items.name: ReportVersioning
nested_items.description: Whether you want Amazon Web Services to overwrite the previous version of each report or to deliver the report in addition to the previous versions.

nested_items.name: BillingViewArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name of the billing view. The BillingViewArn is needed to create Amazon Web Services Cost and Usage Report for each billing group maintained in the Amazon Web Services Billing Conductor service. The BillingViewArn for a billing group can be constructed as: arn:aws:billing::payer-account-id:billingview/billing-group-primary-account-id.

nested_items.name: lastDelivery
nested_items.description: A timestamp that gives the date of a report delivery.

nested_items.name: lastStatus
nested_items.description: An enum that gives the status of a report delivery.
